禮.definition: gift; rite; ceremony; CL:份[fen4]; propriety; etiquette; courtesy

禮儀之邦.definition: a land of ceremony and propriety

禮壞樂崩.definition: see 禮崩樂壞|礼崩乐坏[li3 beng1 yue4 huai4]

禮多人不怪.definition: nobody will find fault with extra courtesy (idiom); courtesy costs nothing

禮尚往來.definition: lit. proper behavior is based on reciprocity (idiom); fig. to return politeness for politeness

禮崩樂壞.definition: rites and music are in ruins (idiom); fig. society in total disarray; cf. 禮樂|礼乐[li3 yue4]

禮帽.definition: hat that goes with formal dress; top hat

禮廢樂崩.definition: see 禮崩樂壞|礼崩乐坏[li3 beng1 yue4 huai4]

禮拜.definition: to attend a religious service; (coll.) week; (coll.) Sunday

禮教吃人.definition: sufferings brought about by Confucian ethics

禮數.definition: etiquette; (old) gradation of etiquette with social status

禮服.definition: ceremonial robe; formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)

禮樂.definition: (Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)

禮樂崩壞.definition: see 禮崩樂壞|礼崩乐坏[li3 beng1 yue4 huai4]

禮泉.definition: Liquan County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi

禮泉縣.definition: Liquan County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi

禮經.definition: Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])

禮縣.definition: Li county in Longnan 隴南|陇南[Long3 nan2], Gansu

禮義廉恥.definition: sense of propriety, justice, integrity and honor (i.e. the four social bonds, 四維|四维[si4 wei2])

禮讓.definition: to show consideration for (others); to yield to (another vehicle etc); courtesy; comity

禮賓部.definition: concierge department of a hotel or resort

禮輕人意重.definition: slight present but weighty meaning (idiom); It's not the present the counts, it's the thought behind it.

禮輕人意重，千里送鵝毛.pinyin: lǐ qīng rén yì zhòng ， qiān lǐ sòng é máo
禮輕人意重，千里送鵝毛.definition: goose feather sent from afar, a slight present but weighty meaning (idiom); It's not the present the counts, it's the thought behind it.

禮輕情意重.definition: goose feather sent from afar, a trifling present with a weighty thought behind it (idiom); It's not the gift that counts, but the thought behind it.
